text: This was my favorite album growing up. Taylor Swift was a great role model for me to have.
I really loved the catchy hooks on this album. Katy Perry's voice is great, too
I think this is the least memorable out of all of Ed Sheeran's albums.
I think this is the least memorable out of all of Ed Sheeran's albums.
I forgot how great Adele was! Her voice is truly one of a kind. I really hope I get to see her live!
